titleStmt.title: An enquiry into the nature, necessity, and evidence of Christian faith, in several essays part I [-II] of faith in general, and of the belief of a deity / by John Cockburn ...
titleStmt.author: Cockburn, John, 1652-1729.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus) Library.

"An enquiry into the nature, necessity, and evidence of Christian faith, in several essays, part II, of faith, with respect to divine providence" has special t.p. and separate paging, with imprint date of 1697.
